title: Riot Please Help
body:
Basically had to quit a game because of this troll can you please do something about him he has had decent match history but something seems to be making him angry so he takes it out on those in Ranked. 
We need a kick/ban system for ranked games

replies.body: You forgot to cover up the names in chat in some of the photos. Better fix those please

> [{quoted}](name=Riso,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gR5Rbv5A,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-02-17T20:55:07.298+0000)
>
> You forgot to cover up the names in chat in some of the photos. Better fix those please

I swear they were blanked out in paint weird
I actually know someone who was in lobby with you lmao.

> [{quoted}](name=Musterpulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gR5Rbv5A,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-17T09:07:52.689+0000)
>
> I actually know someone who was in lobby with you lmao.

lol well it happened 3 times in a row twice for My team once for the other
mate...you dont get a loss for dodging in provs. plz check before complaining about something you know nothing about

> [{quoted}](name=Marksman55,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=gR5Rbv5A,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-02-17T08:08:25.447+0000)
>
> mate...you dont get a loss for dodging in provs. plz check before complaining about something you know nothing about

Huh I didn't know this but thanks better do some editing
